title: “Ledge” or “Tand” means a shelf- like projection supported in any manner, except by vertical supports, within a room itself but without a projection of more than half a meter
clause_text: “Ledge” or “Tand” means a shelf- like projection supported in any manner, except by vertical supports, within a room itself but without a projection of more than half a meter.
